page.title: 12English translation pp 6-10.
page.content: P6. Education. 53 children in the school in 3 classes. School lunches provided daily at 57p per meal. Welsh and English are used and topics studied are wide and varied. P7. Leisure. Much of our playing time is spent out of doors and vary according to time of year,-cycling, various ball games and fishing.Various clubs cater for winter evenings. P8. Event. Annually,villagers organise a fund raising event- the proceeds shared amongst local societies.The Demolition Derby of old cars is held at a local farm and draws big crowds. P9. Event. Describes a May Day by a 9 year old girl visiting the Crowning Ceremony at Harlech Carnival. P10. Health. People today are more aware of the need to eat moderately, to keep fit and healthy.Many join clubs and societies to maintain this.
